label: $SERVICE_NAME for $ARCH
description: Sample Horizon service that receives data via MQTT broker and sends it to IBM Event Streams

userInput.name: EVTSTREAMS_API_KEY
userInput.label: The API key to use when sending message to your instance of IBM Message Hub

userInput.name: EVTSTREAMS_BROKER_URL
userInput.label: The broker url to use when sending message to your instance of IBM Message Hub

userInput.name: EVTSTREAMS_TOPIC
userInput.label: The topic to use when sending message to your instance of IBM Message Hub

userInput.name: EVTSTREAMS_CERT_ENCODED
userInput.label: The base64-encoded self-signed certificate to use when sending messages to your ICP instance of IBM Event Streams. Not needed for IBM Cloud Event Streams.
